input5: How can I update my Aadhar address online?

web_search_results.title: Online Address Update Process - Unique Identification Authority of ...
web_search_results.snippet: I successfully submitted my address update request. How can I track this? keyboard_arrow_down On successful submission of an online address update request, a SRN (Service Request Number) is generated, which is shown on screen and also sent via SMS to your registered mobile number.

web_search_results.title: How To Change Address In Aadhaar Card Online? - ClearTax
web_search_results.snippet: Given below is the online address update process for your Aadhar card: Step 1: Login to myAadhaar portal by entering your Aadhaar number, captcha code and OTP. Step 2: After logging in, select the option 'Address Update' tab. Step 3: On the next tab, click on 'Update Aadhaar Online' tab.

web_search_results.title: Aadhar Card Update Online: Mobile, Address, DOB, Name Correction
web_search_results.snippet: How to Update Aadhar Card Online. You can also update your Aadhar card from your mobile phone easily. Follow these steps to Update your Aadhar Card Online. Visit the website myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in; Here you will find the Login Option; Click on the Login and Enter your Aadhar Number and OTP (received on the registered mobile number)

web_search_results.title: How to Change Address in Aadhaar Card Online for Free?
web_search_results.snippet: How To Download the Aadhaar Card After Address Change? Once your address update is approved, you can download the updated Aadhaar card in a few simple steps: Visit the UIDAI e-Aadhaar Portal and head to the Download Aadhaar page. Enter your Aadhaar number, VID, or Enrolment ID. Enter the OTP sent to your registered mobile number for verification.
